com.server.interfaces

Interface Server

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DebugServer

    public interface Server
extends java.lang.Runnable
    Servers are responsible for accepting Socket connections, and spinning off Listeners and Senders to communicate with Clients. It is also responsible for providing access to Clients, Scheduling services, and the State.
    Author:
    Stephen Patel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.net.SocketAddress getAddress()
      Get the SocketAddress of this Servers ServerSocket.
      int getPort()
      Get the port this Server is listening on.
      State getState()
      Get the State of this Server.
      boolean isRunning()
      Checks to see if this server is running.
      void shutDown()
      Shuts down the server.
